name: CJABA: THE GAME [DEMO]
description:
Click The Downloadable Link. Then Wait For it to finish

then when its done click on it, it should show up and ask to extract.

Click yes, DO NOT CLICK ON THE ICE CUBE ICON TO PLAY. Then a folder should

appear with the name of the game. then open the folder in the downloads in the files application, then all you need to do is click the horse chesspiece and Enjoy the demo!
